15#include "metislib.h"
16
17
18/*************************************************************************
19* This function computes cuts and balance information
20**************************************************************************/
21void ComputePartitionInfoBipartite(graph_t *graph, idx_t nparts, idx_t *where)
22{
23 idx_t i, j, k, nvtxs, ncon, mustfree=0;
24 idx_t *xadj, *adjncy, *vwgt, *vsize, *adjwgt, *kpwgts, *tmpptr;
25 idx_t *padjncy, *padjwgt, *padjcut;
26
27 nvtxs = graph->nvtxs;
28 ncon = graph->ncon;
29 xadj = graph->xadj;
30 adjncy = graph->adjncy;
31 vwgt = graph->vwgt;
32 vsize = graph->vsize;
33 adjwgt = graph->adjwgt;
34
35 if (vwgt == NULL) {
36 vwgt = graph->vwgt = ismalloc(n: nvtxs, ival: 1, msg: "vwgt");
37 mustfree = 1;
38 }
39 if (adjwgt == NULL) {
40 adjwgt = graph->adjwgt = ismalloc(n: xadj[nvtxs], ival: 1, msg: "adjwgt");
41 mustfree += 2;
42 }
43
44 printf(format: "%"PRIDX"-way Cut: %5"PRIDX", Vol: %5"PRIDX", ", nparts, ComputeCut(graph, where), ComputeVolume(graph, where));
45
46 /* Compute balance information */
47 kpwgts = ismalloc(n: ncon*nparts, ival: 0, msg: "ComputePartitionInfo: kpwgts");
48
49 for (i=0; i<nvtxs; i++) {
50 for (j=0; j<ncon; j++)
51 kpwgts[where[i]*ncon+j] += vwgt[i*ncon+j];
52 }
53
54 if (ncon == 1) {
55 printf(format: "\tBalance: %5.3"PRREAL" out of %5.3"PRREAL"\n",
56 1.0*nparts*kpwgts[iargmax(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)]/(1.0*isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts, incx: 1)),
57 1.0*nparts*vwgt[iargmax(n: nvtxs, x: vwgt)]/(1.0*isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts, incx: 1)));
58 }
59 else {
60 printf(format: "\tBalance:");
61 for (j=0; j<ncon; j++)
62 printf(format: " (%5.3"PRREAL" out of %5.3"PRREAL")",
63 1.0*nparts*kpwgts[ncon*iargmax_strd(nparts, kpwgts+j, ncon)+j]/(1.0*isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts+j, incx: ncon)),
64 1.0*nparts*vwgt[ncon*iargmax_strd(nvtxs, vwgt+j, ncon)+j]/(1.0*isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts+j, incx: ncon)));
65 printf(format: "\n");
66 }
67
68
69 /* Compute p-adjncy information */
70 padjncy = ismalloc(n: nparts*nparts, ival: 0, msg: "ComputePartitionInfo: padjncy");
71 padjwgt = ismalloc(n: nparts*nparts, ival: 0, msg: "ComputePartitionInfo: padjwgt");
72 padjcut = ismalloc(n: nparts*nparts, ival: 0, msg: "ComputePartitionInfo: padjwgt");
73
74 iset(n: nparts, val: 0, x: kpwgts);
75 for (i=0; i<nvtxs; i++) {
76 for (j=xadj[i]; j<xadj[i+1]; j++) {
77 if (where[i] != where[adjncy[j]]) {
78 padjncy[where[i]*nparts+where[adjncy[j]]] = 1;
79 padjcut[where[i]*nparts+where[adjncy[j]]] += adjwgt[j];
80 if (kpwgts[where[adjncy[j]]] == 0) {
81 padjwgt[where[i]*nparts+where[adjncy[j]]] += vsize[i];
82 kpwgts[where[adjncy[j]]] = 1;
83 }
84 }
85 }
86 for (j=xadj[i]; j<xadj[i+1]; j++)
87 kpwgts[where[adjncy[j]]] = 0;
88 }
89
90 for (i=0; i<nparts; i++)
91 kpwgts[i] = isum(n: nparts, x: padjncy+i*nparts, incx: 1);
92 printf(format: "Min/Max/Avg/Bal # of adjacent subdomains: %5"PRIDX" %5"PRIDX" %5"PRIDX" %7.3"PRREAL"\n",
93 kpwgts[iargmin(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)], kpwgts[iargmax(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)], isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts, incx: 1)/nparts,
94 1.0*nparts*kpwgts[iargmax(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)]/(1.0*isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts, incx: 1)));
95
96 for (i=0; i<nparts; i++)
97 kpwgts[i] = isum(n: nparts, x: padjcut+i*nparts, incx: 1);
98 printf(format: "Min/Max/Avg/Bal # of adjacent subdomain cuts: %5"PRIDX" %5"PRIDX" %5"PRIDX" %7.3"PRREAL"\n",
99 kpwgts[iargmin(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)], kpwgts[iargmax(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)], isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts, incx: 1)/nparts,
100 1.0*nparts*kpwgts[iargmax(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)]/(1.0*isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts, incx: 1)));
101
102 for (i=0; i<nparts; i++)
103 kpwgts[i] = isum(n: nparts, x: padjwgt+i*nparts, incx: 1);
104 printf(format: "Min/Max/Avg/Bal/Frac # of interface nodes: %5"PRIDX" %5"PRIDX" %5"PRIDX" %7.3"PRREAL" %7.3"PRREAL"\n",
105 kpwgts[iargmin(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)], kpwgts[iargmax(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)], isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts, incx: 1)/nparts,
106 1.0*nparts*kpwgts[iargmax(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)]/(1.0*isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts, incx: 1)), 1.0*isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts, incx: 1)/(1.0*nvtxs));
107
108
109 if (mustfree == 1 || mustfree == 3) {
110 gk_free(ptr1: (void **)&vwgt, LTERM);
111 graph->vwgt = NULL;
112 }
113 if (mustfree == 2 || mustfree == 3) {
114 gk_free(ptr1: (void **)&adjwgt, LTERM);
115 graph->adjwgt = NULL;
116 }
117
118 gk_free(ptr1: (void **)&kpwgts, &padjncy, &padjwgt, &padjcut, LTERM);
119}
120
121
122/*************************************************************************
123* This function computes the balance of the partitioning
124**************************************************************************/
125void ComputePartitionBalance(graph_t *graph, idx_t nparts, idx_t *where, real_t *ubvec)
126{
127 idx_t i, j, nvtxs, ncon;
128 idx_t *kpwgts, *vwgt;
129 real_t balance;
130
131 nvtxs = graph->nvtxs;
132 ncon = graph->ncon;
133 vwgt = graph->vwgt;
134
135 kpwgts = ismalloc(n: nparts, ival: 0, msg: "ComputePartitionInfo: kpwgts");
136
137 if (vwgt == NULL) {
138 for (i=0; i<nvtxs; i++)
139 kpwgts[where[i]]++;
140 ubvec[0] = 1.0*nparts*kpwgts[iargmax(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)]/(1.0*nvtxs);
141 }
142 else {
143 for (j=0; j<ncon; j++) {
144 iset(n: nparts, val: 0, x: kpwgts);
145 for (i=0; i<graph->nvtxs; i++)
146 kpwgts[where[i]] += vwgt[i*ncon+j];
147
148 ubvec[j] = 1.0*nparts*kpwgts[iargmax(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)]/(1.0*isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts, incx: 1));
149 }
150 }
151
152 gk_free(ptr1: (void **)&kpwgts, LTERM);
153
154}
155
156
157/*************************************************************************
158* This function computes the balance of the element partitioning
159**************************************************************************/
160real_t ComputeElementBalance(idx_t ne, idx_t nparts, idx_t *where)
161{
162 idx_t i;
163 idx_t *kpwgts;
164 real_t balance;
165
166 kpwgts = ismalloc(n: nparts, ival: 0, msg: "ComputeElementBalance: kpwgts");
167
168 for (i=0; i<ne; i++)
169 kpwgts[where[i]]++;
170
171 balance = 1.0*nparts*kpwgts[iargmax(n: nparts, x: kpwgts)]/(1.0*isum(n: nparts, x: kpwgts, incx: 1));
172
173 gk_free(ptr1: (void **)&kpwgts, LTERM);
174
175 return balance;
176
177}
